fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Throw butter at a player (once per. night, duh), roleblocking them.
- Throw a kernel at someone (once per. night, duh), framing whomever they visit.
- Spend 6 sun to temporarily transform into a Cob Cannon and deal an Unstoppable Rampaging Attack to a player. You may only do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may only use one ability at a time lol
